CustomField.formula: "I, "+First_Name__c+" "+Middle_Name__c+" "+Last_Name__c+", the undersigned, am the "+Title_Company_Position__c+" for "+Legal_Entity_Name__c+", with the authority to act for, and on behalf of the contractor named in this registration. I certify under penalty of perjury, that all of the information provided is true and correct. I further acknowledge that any untruthful information provided in this application could result in the registration being canceled."
CustomField.label: Penalty of Perjury Statement
